pages.text: The $(item)Jingle Dress$() is a leaf dress adorned with bells. It releases Melody when you move and jump around, and a speed potion increases it even further.$(br2)While it doesn't create a lot of Melody and its $(l:basics/music)Melody Threshold$() is easily reached, it can still be deciding for the success of a Ceremony. Dancing while playing other Instruments is crucial for every Totemist.
$(br)Unlike other Instruments, the Jingle Dress cannot be used as a $(l:ceremonies)Ceremony Selector$().
